name: allegro-poszukiwacz
description: Browser extension for Allegro.pl for quick jump to not-promoted offers

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npm run chrome-build && NODE_ENV=production npm run opera-build && NODE_ENV=production npm run firefox-build
scripts.chrome-dist: NODE_ENV=production TARGET=chrome gulp dist && NODE_ENV=production TARGET=chrome gulp zip
scripts.opera-dist: NODE_ENV=production TARGET=opera gulp dist && NODE_ENV=production TARGET=opera gulp zip
scripts.firefox-dist: NODE_ENV=production TARGET=firefox gulp dist && NODE_ENV=production TARGET=firefox gulp zip
scripts.dist: npm run chrome-dist && npm run opera-dist && npm run firefox-dist

author: Piotr Kochan
